error.title: Tracking error
error.generic: An error occurred while tracking the package

info.title: Multi-carrier tracking
info.description: Our system supports package tracking for over 600 carriers worldwide, including FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS, and many more.

bulk.title: Bulk tracking
bulk.description: Enter multiple tracking numbers (one per line or separated by commas)
bulk.limit: You can track up to 10 packages at once
